Conflict of Heroes: Storms of Steel! – Kursk 1943
英雄对决: 钢铁风暴 – 库尔斯克 1943

boardgame.description: Massive tank battles for the historical wargame that Eurogamers love to play!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Storms of Steel! makes you a witness to the greatest tank battle in history! After their stinging defeat at Stalingrad, the Germans mass their best forces for an all-out attack against the growing Soviet bulge at Kursk. The Soviets_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo; network of master spies has caught wind of the German plans, and they are prepared to trap and decimate the best panzer forces the Germans can muster..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;No one is safe from the blazing steel raining from above as dive bombers and strafing attacks are combined with ground operations. Now you will need to consider all three dimensions of the battlefield with the unique new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;3D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; aircraft movement and attack rules. Your ground forces get a boost also, with the new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Veteran_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Special Weapon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; cards that allow you to customize your units to suit your own tactical goals and style!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Storms of Steel! is the second stand-alone title in the best selling _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Conflict of Heroes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; series and follows in the footsteps of Awakening the Bear! Each game in the series uses the same core rules system, so it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s easy to advance from one game to the next!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Conflict of Heroes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; system offers a unique blend of playability and realism._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fun: Quick-paced simultaneous play keeps you in the action all the time! _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fast: Scenarios can be played in as little as half an hour or as long as 2 hours. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Easy: You can teach a new player how to play in under 5 minutes! _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; BIG: The high quality maps _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; counters are BIG and easy to read. The counters are 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; square! _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Multi-player: Scenarios are included that are playable by 2 - 4 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Historically Accurate: Learn the unique tactics and logistics used by each side as you experience the same battlefield challenges real commanders faced! Noted historical game designers and WWII researchers Dana Lombardy, Bill Jaffe, and John Hill have joined forces to make the campaigns as realistic as possible._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Storms of Steel! includes 4 new geomorphic map boards (including river, hill, and city overlays), 72 pc action card deck, hundreds of new units including Tiger tanks, Soviet rockets, strafing airplanes, and much, more!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. CONFLICT OF HEROES: STORMS OF STEEL! - KURSK 1943: $60.00 Academy Games Availability: DIRECT ORDER - in stock at supplier and will be included on our next order from supplier. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** CoH STORMS OF STEEL KURSK 1943: $48.95 (pre-order) Academy Games [AYG 5002] Expected Arrival Date at CLS Games: Late September _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;09 *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $14.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

Academy Games (AYG 5002) Storms of Steel witnesses histories greatest tank battle. After the stinging defeat at Stalingrad, the Germans gather their best forces for an all out attack to smash through the Soviet lines. The Soviets, having learned of the German_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s plan through their spy networks, prepare a trap to stop and then decimate Germany_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s best Panzer forces. All new units including Tiger tanks, Soviet rockets, strafing airplanes, Soviet Red Guards, and much more! 4 huge new map boards! All new firefights, including detailed historical backgrounds. Storms of Steel continues the groundbreaking game concepts introduced in Awakening the Bear with new highly integrated airplane and anti-air rules. Stukas dive bomb, Sturmoviks strafe, and FlaKpanzer Wirbelwinds desperately try to fend off the death from above.

New in Shrink. £7.00 postage to UK. I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a 2.5% discount for purchases over £50 and 5% for purchases over £100. All items (700 unique games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.

This is the Limited Edition signed by Uwe Eickert, and includes the Kursk Campaign book from Osprey Publishing. The counters have been punched and bagged, and the game has has been very lightly played. There is no visible wear on any components. The box has a very minor dent on the bottom right.

This game is in excellent condition. The shrink has been removed from the box but the components are untouched. Counters are unpunched. This will ship via USPS, UPS or Fed Ex at my discretion. Thanks.
Game is in excellent condition, and includes a GMT style chit tray with the unit chits separated in it. I prefer to ship via USPS Priority, but am flexible.

Storms of Steel! makes you a witness to the greatest tank battle in history! After their stinging defeat at Stalingrad, the Germans mass their best forces for an all-out attack against the growing Soviet bulge at Kursk. The Soviets’ network of master spies has caught wind of the German plans, and they are prepared to trap and decimate the best panzer forces the Germans can muster... Storms of Steel! is the second stand-alone title in the best selling Conflict of Heroes series and follows in the footsteps of Awakening the Bear! by winning the 2010 Origins Award for Best Historical Board game. Each game in the series uses the same core rules system, so it’s easy to advance from one game to the next! Bought this game and played it a couple of times...not really my cup of tea. Will ship world wide so please contact for a postage quote. Cheers Bennettpom
Everything present, correct and in good condition. Only played a few times Shipping UK £8.00 / Europe £16.00

Academy Games (AYG 5002) Storms of Steel! makes you a witness to the greatest tank battle in history! After their stinging defeat at Stalingrad, the Germans mass their best forces for an all-out attack against the growing Soviet bulge at Kursk. The Soviets’ network of master spies has caught wind of the German plans, and they are prepared to trap and decimate the best panzer forces the Germans can muster... Storms of Steel! is the second stand-alone title in the best selling “Conflict of Heroes” series and follows in the footsteps of Awakening the Bear! by winning the 2010 Origins Award for Best Historical Boardgame. Each game in the series uses the same core rules system, so it’s easy to advance from one game to the next!

Its big - Its huge. Punched and in excellent shape. Counters neatly stored in a counter tray. Even the dice are baggied. All contents appear to be intact even Uwe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s letter!! HOWEVER I HAVE NOT VERIFIED THE NUMBER OF COUNTERS but I have no reason to believe that they are not all there. AND its cheap. Nice box with no busted corners and little wear. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered even Facebook stock. Combine ship on multiple buys but buyer beware - this is a heavy one!!
